definition: Wang Zhizhi (1977-), former Chinese basketball player
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: As we know, Wang Zhizhi is the first player in Asia to join the NBA.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，王治郅是到NBA打球的亞洲第一人。

sentences.english: China's Wang Zhizhi collected a game-high 17 points and 4 rebounds.
sentences.chinese: 本場比賽，王治郅得到全場最高的17分和4籃板。

sentences.english: As we all know, Wang Zhizhi is the first player in Asia to join the NBA.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，王治郅是到NBA打球的亞洲第一人。

sentences.english: Wang showed excellent agility and the ability to run the court.
sentences.chinese: 王治郅顯示出非凡的靈活性和馳騁球場的能力。

sentences.english: Yi Jianlian, Wang Zhizhi got 22 and 19 points respectively.
sentences.chinese: 場上，易建聯得22分，王治郅獲19分。
